c-0: ^ Cedric: Sorry, I'm a little busy right now.

Divert1: ^Oisin: I was entrapped here by the Bunny Lady's scheme.
^Oisin: Had you not opened the chest and discovered the true essence of the Echo of the Wild,
^Oisin: I would have remained undiscovered forever.

c-0: ^ Cedric: Do you have any idea who might have set this trap?
^Oisin: I suspect the guards of the Bunny Lady.
^Oisin: She's determined to prevent any challenge to her rule,
^Oisin: even if it means trapping the guardians of the forest.
c-1: ^ Cedric: What can I do to help you?
^Oisin: Could you help me escape from this trap, please?

c-0: ^ Cedric: I'm not sure it's safe to release a lion, even one as grand as yourself...
c-1: ^ Cedric: Of course, I'll help. You won't harm me, will you?
^Oisin: Never. I would never harm someone who is trying to save me. But I won't forget those who have tricked me.

c-0: ^ Cedric: Let me see... This trap is tightly secured.
^Oisin: If you could use some magic to free me...
^ Cedric: I'll try using a spell.
c-1: ^ Cedric: Let's try the old-fashioned way.

Refuse_Ending: ^Cedric: You refused to help the lion.
Magic_Helping: ^Cedric: You decide to use forbidden magic to rescue the lion.
Manual_Helping: ^Cedric: You manage to free the lion using brute force.
